pages.text: Plant fiber comes from breaking long grass; flint flakes come from right-clicking flint on rock. You need both to make your starter tools.$(br2)Look for rivers! They may be choked with quicksand, but their banks can hold grass and clay.
Wood and stone tools aren't available; use flint. Metal tools need to be forged on a Tinker's Anvil or cast in a Metal Caster.

Oases typically have one or two large ore deposits, instead of many small ones. The ore flowers on the surface will show you where to dig.$(br2)Platinum deposits aren't marked by flowers the way other ores are; you'll need to use a prospecting pick to look for nuggets, instead.

The desert has barely any ores except for coal, saltpeter, and oil.$(br2)Crouch while chopping a tree to fell the entire tree at once.$(br2)You can find silkworms in birch leaves. Harvest silk from them to craft light, cooling armour.
